title: More Bits from Blinkbonny. ... Second edition
author: Strathesk, John
snippet: In winter the ice on the " Damhead " had its few skaters, but its shoals of sliders, crying, " Clear the road !" " Keep the puddin' bet!" faUing in heaps, scrambling out, and up and at it again. There were also " snaw-ba' bickers;" but as these are in every village, I must not further tax the reader's patience on the subject, for schoolboy and schoolgirl hfe is much the same to-day as it was sixty years ago.
